history: TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
TTS <speak> Great! I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. </speak>
TTS Where do you want to go?For example, you can say I'm going to the airport
USER I'm going to Children's Hospital.
TTS Okay, going to upmc children's hospital of pittsburgh.
TTS Where would you like to leave from?
TTS Okay, leaving from carnegie mellon university.
TTS When do you want to travel
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>

TTS There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 19 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.If you would like to go by driving instead, please say start over, and then choose driving directions..
Walk for about 7 mins to Craig St at Park Plaza..
Take the 93 ,to Main St at Penn avenue NS. It will depart at 7:15pm..
Walk for about 4 mins to 4401 Penn avenue..
TTS <speak>if you missed anything, please say repeat, else say continue</speak>
